name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snowy Forest Christmas Night House View: Live Wallpaper for Chrome

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the magic of a snowy Christmas night into your Chrome with this beautiful live wallpaper of a cozy house in a winter forest

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the serene beauty of a snowy forest at Christmas night, where a warm, inviting house stands surrounded by snow-covered trees. The twinkling lights in the windows and the soft glow from the chimney create a peaceful holiday atmosphere every time you open your browser. This live wallpaper isn't just stunning â€” it's also practical.

It features a built-in Google search bar, allowing you to search instantly without leaving the wallpaper. Plus, popular website shortcuts are easily accessible, so you can quickly jump to your favorite sites. Download this live wallpaper now and transform your browsing experience into a holiday celebration every day!
